 <a href="

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detention_of_the_Dead</a>

THE BREAKFAST CLUB meets ZOMBIELAND in this head-busting zombedy.
 A group of teenagers trapped in detention fight for survival after their classmates turn into a ravenous zombie horde.
 Can a stoner, a jock, a bully, a goth, and a nerd put aside their differences for one night to take on the undead? Will they live to see the morning? 
Fat chance! This is High School after all.
